name: Performance Marketing
description: Here, the clients pay only when a solicited response is received from the target. It may be a lead received, a click or an actual sale.

name: Pay Per Click
description: As the name suggests, you pay only after someone clicks on the targeted link. This model is also called cost per click.

name: Google ads
description: When you want to receive a faster response on a larger scale, google ads help achieve it for you. Advertisers usually pay per click in this model of  advertising.

name: Social Media Campaign Management
description: This is a critical activity that manages social media campaigns so that maximum benefits are derived at minimum cost. A professional social media campaign management ensures that the message or campaign is reaching the right segment to obtain the desired response.
